Use the coat rack as a makeshift bookshelf by hanging books and other items on the hooks.
Use the coat rack as a clothesline by hanging clothes and other items on the hooks.
Use the coat rack as a wall organizer by hanging baskets and other items on the hooks.
Use the coat rack as a towel rack by hanging towels and other items on the hooks.
Use the coat rack as a hanger for artwork or photographs by hanging them on the hooks.
